name: My Little Space Game
description:
You're a little astronaut with a big problem!

You have crash landed back onto a little planet and your spaceship has broken.

Find all the pieces, put the spaceship back together, and get back home!

Featuring:
  • A cute little astronaut (that's you)
  • Beautiful, minimal, picturesque views
  • No enemies, no stress
  • A jet pack!
